alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:09PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Alfalfa County through 245 PM CDT... At 209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Carmen, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, Carmen, Aline and Lambert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
